mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_eat_spec.select */ SELECT stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ ,gfix_dt /* gfix_dt 성장비만지수_일자 character(8) */ ,nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,avg_eat_qty /* avg_eat_qty 평균_섭취_량 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ts_dd_eat_spec WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND gfix_dt = #{gfixDt} /* gfix_dt 성장비만지수_일자 character(8) */ AND nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_eat_spec.update */ UPDATE ts_dd_eat_spec
,avg_eat_qty = #{avgEatQty} /* avg_eat_qty 평균_섭취_량 numeric */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND gfix_dt = #{gfixDt} /* gfix_dt 성장비만지수_일자 character(8) */ AND nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_eat_spec.merge */ INSERT INTO ts_dd_eat_spec ( stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ gfix_dt /* gfix_dt 성장비만지수_일자 character(8) */ nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,avg_eat_qty /* avg_eat_qty 평균_섭취_량 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ #{gfixDt} /* gfix_dt 성장비만지수_일자 character(8) */ #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ ,#{avgEatQty} /* avg_eat_qty 평균_섭취_량 numeric */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
,avg_eat_qty = #{avgEatQty} /* avg_eat_qty 평균_섭취_량 numeric */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_eat_spec.delete */ DELETE FROM ts_dd_eat_spec WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND gfix_dt = #{gfixDt} /* gfix_dt 성장비만지수_일자 character(8) */ AND nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */
